elements.name: intro_computer_vision_post
elements.html:
Code.org Self-paced Online Professional Learning - Computer Vision!

Post-Module Survey

Thanks for learning with us!

Code.org relies on surveys as a crucial tool through which we remain connected to teachers, and to give you the opportunity to provide feedback about our curriculum and your teaching experience, as well as to improve our programs.

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share anonymous, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your anonymized responses will be used by Code.org for program improvement.

Your honesty and candor are appreciated.

Computer Vision - Post-Module Survey

elements.name: computer_vision_better_understanding
elements.title: After completing this module, I have a better understanding of how computer vision works.

elements.name: computer_vision_comfort_supporting_students_learn
elements.title: After completing this module, I am more comfortable in my ability to support students in understanding computer vision concepts.

elements.name: computer_vision_know_what_students_learn
elements.title: After completing this module, I have a basic understanding of what my students will learn in Code.org’s Computer Vision curriculum.

elements.name: computer_vision_comfort_ability_to_teach
elements.title: After completing this module, I feel more comfortable in my ability to teach Code.org’s Computer Vision curriculum than I did before starting this professional learning course.

elements.name: computer_vision_different_grade_levels
elements.title: Having the course split into grade levels was helpful to me.

elements.name: computer_vision_easy_navigation
elements.title: Course navigation was clear and easy to follow.

elements.name: computer_vision_supported_learning
elements.title: Which of the following supported your learning the most? Rank the options from most helpful (5) to least helpful (1). Please apply each rank (1-5) exactly once; don't give the same ranking to two different items.

rows.text: Reading a page that contained text and images about a topic.

Making a plan to prepare to teach Code.org's Computer Vision.
Completing a check for understanding question.

elements.title: How long did you spend completing this module?

elements.name: nps_self_paced_pd
elements.title: How likely are you to recommend this self-paced professional learning experience to a friend or colleague?

elements.name: computer_vision_other_feedback
elements.title: Do you have any feedback about this module that you would like to share with the Code.org team?

elements.name: computer_vision_participate_focus_group
elements.title: OPTIONAL: Would you be willing to participate in a follow-up focus group to provide direct feedback about this online course?

elements.title: Great! Please share an email address where we may contact you.
